main.description: Data that locates something relative to the Earth, usually a somewhat fixed location.

long.description: The WGS84 longitude of a spatial thing (decimal degrees).

lat.description: The WGS84 latitude of a spatial thing (decimal degrees).

alt.description: The WGS84 altitude of a spatial thing (decimal meters above the local reference ellipsoid)

mappableAddress.description: A textual address that can be mapped using mapping software.

hasDetailedGeometry.description: A spatial geometry of any complexity and tooling supported by geosparql.

name.description: An informal or formal textual identifier for an object. Does not imply uniqueness.

note.description: Any useful textual information related to the item.
